name: Techno-shot
description:
Techno-shot is classical shooter game where your mission is reach the points and kill the robots that want to kill you. This is my first game, so it's not advanced. 

P.SI'm sorry about the console dows, but it's because the graphics look better with it. You can always turn off the console, just stop the game and press 'close'.

EDIT:I don,t know why the graphics setting are not working in builded version..I'll try to repair it but now final game look worse than game on screenshots
